comment.body:
Dictatorship always has its own reasons to break democracy. And dictatorship begins with the control of the information an manipulation of words.
Pirates are only those who are stealing ships with force. But if for those who are giving their videos to a couple of friends are used words similar with terrorism then it happens for the manipulation of the justice system.
Those interests who create something valorous for the humanity should be protected of course.
The interests of a scientist who create a medicine which saves millions of lives would be protected with the same determination as the interests of a movie company ?
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1G2TYVkNJvVfmRqPtWGTLqHDUjJKMjMEBA
